util:properties.prop: DELETE FROM invoicing_report_details WHERE product_id = (SELECT row_id FROM invoicing_catalog_product WHERE product = :product AND invoicing_enabled = 1) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month,'-',day,'-',year),'%m-%d-%Y') between :init_date and :end_date

INSERT INTO invoicing_report_details (product_id, year, month, day, mdn, rate_plan, days_on_plan, mou, mbs, sms, mms) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (SELECT row_id FROM invoicing_catalog_product WHERE product = :product AND invoicing_enabled = 1), year(call_date) as 'Year', month(call_date) as 'Month', day(call_date) as 'Day', mdn as mdn, rate_plan as 'Rate-Plan', ROUND((SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(duration_end, duration_start))/3600)/24)) AS 'Days_On_Plan', FLOOR(sum(actual_mou/60)) as 'Actual_MOU', ROUND(sum((actual_kbs/1024)/1024),0) as 'Actual_MBS', FLOOR(sum(actual_sms)) as 'Actual_SMS', FLOOR(sum(actual_mms)) as 'Actual_MMS' FROM reseller_subs_usage WHERE product = :product AND date(call_date) between :init_date and :end_date GROUP BY mdn, rate_plan ORDER BY mdn, rate_plan ) tmp_table ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE days_on_plan = tmp_table.Days_On_Plan, mou = tmp_table.Actual_MOU, mbs = tmp_table.Actual_MBS, sms = tmp_table.Actual_SMS, mms = tmp_table.Actual_MMS, update_date = NOW()

SELECT row_id, year, month, mdn, rate_plan, days_on_plan, mou, mbs, sms, mms FROM invoicing_report_details WHERE product_id = (SELECT row_id FROM invoicing_catalog_product WHERE product = :product) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(year, '-', month, '-', day), '%Y-%m-%d') between :init_date and :end_date ORDER BY mdn, rate_plan -- make sure we have the right order as the old reports.
